For example, our integrated approach means that during free play, teachers actively guide children to explore scientific concepts when building with sand or practice negotiation skills during role-playing. Structured play sessions focus on problem-solving tasks, ensuring learning objectives are met naturally through exploration and discovery. We are genuinely enthusiastic about our program and the opportunity to potentially welcome your family.
